import json import html import re from datetime import datetime, timezone # Get number format from automation number_format = inputs['number_format'] # Convert Bytes to Megabytes def bytes_to_MB(number_in_Bytes): # Calculate size in MB with two decimal places size_in_mb = round(number_in_Bytes / (1024 * 1024), 2) return size_in_mb # Formats a number with commas as thousands separators, rounded to 2 decimal places def format_with_commas(number): """ Returns: str: The formatted number as a string. """ if isinstance(number, (int)): number = f"{number:,}" elif isinstance(number, (float)): number = f"{number:,.2f}" else: number = number if number_format == 'de': return number.replace(",", "X").replace(".", ",").replace("X", ".") else: return number # Create navigation html bar def navigation_bar_to_html(sheets_json_array, user_selections_json, app_info_exists, measures_exist, dimensions_exist, variables_exist, sheets_exist, script_exist): data = user_selections_json sheets = sheets_json_array # Get user selections selected_sections = data.get('selected', []) # Initialize HTML sttructure for navigation bar nav_bar_html = f'''
    • ''' # General Information Link (activated by default) nav_bar_html += f'''
  • General Information
    • ''' # Data Model Link if 'Data Model' in selected_sections and app_info_exists == 1: nav_bar_html += f'''
  • Data Model
    • ''' # Measures Link if 'Measures' in selected_sections and measures_exist == 1: nav_bar_html += f'''
  • Measures
    • ''' # Dimensions Link if 'Dimensions' in selected_sections and dimensions_exist == 1: nav_bar_html += f'''
  • Dimensions
    • ''' # Variables Link if 'Variables' in selected_sections and variables_exist == 1: nav_bar_html += f'''
  • Variables
    • ''' # Sheets and Visualizations Link if 'Sheets and Visualizations' in selected_sections and sheets_exist == 1: # Initialize html list for li elememts sheet_link_html = '' for sheet in sheets: # ignore empty sheets if len(sheet.get('qChildren', [])) > 0: # Get sheet properties qProperty = sheet.get('qProperty', {}) sheet_qId = qProperty.get('qInfo', {}).get('qId', '') sheet_title = qProperty.get('qMetaDef', {}).get('title', '') sheet_link_html += f'''
  • {sheet_title}
    • ''' nav_bar_html += f'''
  • Sheets & Visualizationsâ–¼

    List of sheets in app

      {sheet_link_html}
    • ''' # Load Script Link if 'Load Script' in selected_sections and script_exist == 1: nav_bar_html += f'''
  • Load Script
    • ''' # Finalize HTML Structure for navigation bar nav_bar_html += f'''
''' return nav_bar_html # Convert app information into html def app_info_to_html(json_data): # Parse the JSON data data = json_data included_attributes = { "name": "Name", "description": "Description", "id": "ID", "_resourcetype": "Resource Type", "usage": "Usage", "owner": "Owner", "published": "Published", "publishTime": "Publish Time", "spaceId": "Space ID", "hasSectionAccess": "Has Section Access", "encrypted": "Is encrypted", "createdDate": "Created Date", "modifiedDate": "Modified Date", "lastReloadTime": "Last Reload Time", } # Extracting info attributes attributes = data.get('info', {}).get('attributes', {}) metadata = data.get('metadata', {}) app_name = attributes.get('name', '') # Start building the HTML html_list_items = '' # Iterate through included attributes and add them to the description list for key, label in included_attributes.items(): if key in attributes: value = attributes[key] if key not in ("createdDate", "modifiedDate", "lastReloadTime") else datetime.strptime(attributes[key], "%Y-%m-%dT%H:%M:%S.%fZ").strftime("%d.%m.%Y %H:%M:%S %Z") html_list_items += f'''
{label}:
{value}
''' # Calculate the App Memory Footprint in MB and add it to the list app_size_bytes = metadata.get('static_byte_size', 0) app_size_mb = bytes_to_MB(app_size_bytes) html_list_items += f'''
App Memory Footprint:
{format_with_commas(app_size_mb)} MB
''' # Calculate the App Reload Peak RAM in MB and add it to the list app_reload_size_bytes = metadata.get('reload_meta', {}).get('peak_memory_bytes', 0) app_reload_size_mb = bytes_to_MB(app_reload_size_bytes) html_list_items += f'''
App Reload Peak RAM:
{format_with_commas(app_reload_size_mb)} MB
''' # Combine HTML list items into a complete HTML list app_info_html = f'''
{html_list_items}
''' return app_info_html, app_name # Convert data model information into html def data_model_to_html(json_data): # Parse the JSON data data = json_data # Extract tables information tables = data.get('metadata', {}).get('tables', []) # Define the included attributes included_table_attributes_left = { "no_of_rows": "Number of Rows", "no_of_fields": "Number of Fields", "no_of_key_fields": "Number of Key Fields" } included_table_attributes_right = { "is_loose": "Is Loose", "comment": "Comment" } included_field_attributes = { "name": "Field Name", "cardinal": "Distinct Values", "total_count": "Non-Null Values" } # Initialize HTML data_model_html = '' # Iterate through tables for table in tables: if not table.get('is_system'): # Get table name table_name = table.get('name') # Extracting attribute values table_attributes = table.keys() # Initiate html list items html_list_items = '' # html part containing title html_list_items += f'''

{table_name}

(table)

''' # Iterate through included attributes for left pannel and add them to the description list for key, label in included_table_attributes_left.items(): if key in table_attributes: value = table[key] html_list_items += f'''
{label}:
{format_with_commas(value) if value != '' else '
'}
''' # html part containing bridge part to right pannel html_list_items += f'''
''' # Iterate through included attributes for right pannel and add them to the description list for key, label in included_table_attributes_right.items(): if key in table_attributes: value = table[key] html_list_items += f'''
{label}:
{value if value != '' else '
'}
''' # Calculate the App size in MB and add it to the list table_size_bytes = table['byte_size'] table_size_mb = bytes_to_MB(table_size_bytes) html_list_items += f'''
Table Size:
{format_with_commas(table_size_mb)} MB
''' # Combine HTML list items into a complete HTML list html_list = f''' {html_list_items}
''' # Get fields for the current table fields = data.get('metadata', {}).get('fields', []) table_fields = [field for field in fields if table_name in field.get('src_tables', [])] # Sort fields by whether they are key fields or not key_fields = [field for field in table_fields if "$key" in field.get('tags', [])] other_fields = [field for field in table_fields if field not in key_fields] # Create the table for fields html_table_head = '' html_table_rows = '' html_table_head += f''' Field Name Distinct Values Non-Null Values Tags Is Hidden Is Key Connected Tables''' # Add key fields first for field in key_fields: is_key = "Yes" is_hidden = "Yes" if '$hidden' in field['tags'] else "No" tags = "
".join(tag[1:] for tag in field['tags'] if tag[0] == '$') connected_tables = "
".join(tab for tab in field['src_tables'] if tab != table_name) field_name = field['name'] distinct_values = field['cardinal'] non_null_values = field['total_count'] html_table_rows += '' html_table_rows += f''' {field_name} {format_with_commas(distinct_values)} {format_with_commas(non_null_values)} {tags} {is_hidden} {is_key} {connected_tables} ''' # Add other fields afterwards for field in other_fields: is_key = "No" is_hidden = "Yes" if '$hidden' in field['tags'] else "No" tags = "
".join(tag[1:] for tag in field['tags'] if tag[0] == '$') connected_tables = "
".join(tab for tab in field['src_tables'] if tab != table_name) field_name = field['name'] distinct_values = field['cardinal'] non_null_values = field['total_count'] html_table_rows += '' html_table_rows += f''' {field_name} {format_with_commas(distinct_values)} {format_with_commas(non_null_values)} {tags} {is_hidden} {is_key} {connected_tables} ''' # Combine HTML table rows into a complete HTML table with Bootstrap classes data_model_html += f''' {html_list}
{html_table_head} {html_table_rows}

''' return data_model_html # Convert measures information into html def measures_to_html(json_array): # Parse JSON data data = json_array # Create HTML list items (terms and details) html_list_items = '' for measure in data: qLabel = measure.get('qMeasure', {}).get('qLabel', '') qId = measure.get('qInfo', {}).get('qId', '') qDef = measure.get('qMeasure', {}).get('qDef', '') qGrouping = 'No' if measure.get('qMeasure', {}).get('qGrouping', '') == 'N' else 'Yes' qLabelExpression = measure.get('qMeasure', {}).get('qLabelExpression', '') title = measure.get('qMetaDef', {}).get('title', '') description = measure.get('qMetaDef', {}).get('description', '') isCustomFormatted = 'No' if measure.get('qMeasure', {}).get('isCustomFormatted', '') == 'false' else 'Yes' qType = measure.get('qMeasure', {}).get('qNumFormat', {}).get('qType', '') qType_text = field_type_mapping.get(qType, qType) # Use mapping or original type qFmt = measure.get('qMeasure', {}).get('qNumFormat', {}).get('qFmt', '') coloring = measure.get('qMeasure', {}).get('coloring', {}) color = coloring.get('baseColor', {}).get('color') if coloring else '' tags = measure.get('qMetaDef', {}).get('tags', '') tags_html = ', '.join(tags) html_list_items += f'''

{title}

(measure)

Label:
{qLabel}
Description:
{description}
ID:
{qId}
Definition:

{qDef}
Expression:
{qLabelExpression}
Grouping:
{qGrouping}
Custom Formatted:
{isCustomFormatted}
Format Type:
{qType_text}
Format:

{qFmt}
Color:

{color}
Tags:
{tags_html}

''' # Combine HTML list items into a complete HTML list measures_html = f''' {html_list_items} ''' return measures_html # Convert dimensions information into html def dimensions_to_html(json_array): # Parse JSON data data = json_array # Create HTML list items (terms and details) html_list_items = '' for dimension in data: qId = dimension.get('qInfo', {}).get('qId', '') qGrouping = 'No' if dimension.get('qDim', {}).get('qGrouping', '') == 'N' else 'Drilldown' qFieldDefs = dimension.get('qDim', {}).get('qFieldDefs', '') qFieldDefs_html = ', '.join(qFieldDefs) qFieldLabels = dimension.get('qDim', {}).get('qFieldLabels', '') qFieldLabels_html = ', '.join(qFieldLabels) title = dimension.get('qMetaDef', {}).get('title', '') description = dimension.get('qMetaDef', {}).get('description', '') tags = dimension.get('qMetaDef', {}).get('tags', '') tags_html = ', '.join(tags) html_list_items += f'''

''' script_html += content_html return script_html # Convert sheets information into html def sheets_to_html(sheets_json_array, dimensions_json_array, measures_json_array, container_objs_json_array): # Parse JSON data data = sheets_json_array master_dimensions = dimensions_json_array master_measures = measures_json_array container_list = container_objs_json_array # Initialize html list for all sheets sheets_html = '' # Iterate through the list of sheets for sheet in data: # ignore empty sheets if len(sheet.get('qChildren', [])) > 0: # Initialize html list for the sheets properties sheet_properties_html = '' # Get sheet properties qProperty = sheet.get('qProperty', {}) qChildren = sheet.get('qChildren', []) sheet_qId = qProperty.get('qInfo', {}).get('qId', '') sheet_qType = qProperty.get('qInfo', {}).get('qType', '') sheet_Type = sheet.get('sheetType','') sheet_title = qProperty.get('qMetaDef', {}).get('title', '') sheet_description = qProperty.get('qMetaDef', {}).get('description', '') # Get spaceType for App app_spaceType = app_info_json.get('spaceType', '') # Get viz types and their corresponding number cell_type_counts = {} for cell in qProperty.get('cells', []): cell_type = cell.get('type', '') if cell_type in cell_type_counts: cell_type_counts[cell_type] += 1 else: cell_type_counts[cell_type] = 1 # Convert list of charts with their numbers in html charts_cnt_html = '' for cell_type, count in cell_type_counts.items(): charts_cnt_html += f'''

check if title is expression or string if is_json_object(chart_title): chart_title = chart_title.get('qStringExpression', {}).get('qExpr') chart_subtitle = chart_qProperty.get('subtitle', '') # check if subtitle is expression or string if is_json_object(chart_subtitle): chart_subtitle = chart_subtitle.get('qStringExpression', {}).get('qExpr') chart_footnote = chart_qProperty.get('footnote', '') # check if footnote is expression or string if is_json_object(chart_footnote): chart_footnote = chart_footnote.get('qStringExpression', {}).get('qExpr') chart_colormode = chart_qProperty.get('color', {}).get('mode', '') chart_color_expr = chart_qProperty.get('color', {}).get('colorExpression', '') chart_color_byMsrDef_key = chart_qProperty.get('color', {}).get('byMeasureDef', {}).get('key', '') chart_color_byMsrDef_type = chart_qProperty.get('color', {}).get('byMeasureDef', {}).get('type', '') chart_color_byDimDef_key = chart_qProperty.get('color', {}).get('byDimDef', {}).get('key', '') chart_color_byDimDef_type = chart_qProperty.get('color', {}).get('byDimDef', {}).get('type', '') chart_color_altLabel = chart_qProperty.get('color', {}).get('altLabel', '') if chart_colormode == 'byExpression': chart_color_def = chart_color_expr elif chart_colormode == 'byDimension': if chart_color_byDimDef_type == 'libraryItem': for master_dim in master_dimensions: chart_mst_dim_qId = master_dim.get('qInfo', {}).get('qId', '') if chart_color_byDimDef_key == chart_mst_dim_qId: chart_color_def = ', '.join(master_dim.get('qDim', {}).get('qFieldLabels', '')) else: chart_color_def = chart_color_altLabel elif chart_colormode == 'byMeasure': if chart_color_byMsrDef_type == 'libraryItem': for master_msr in master_measures: chart_mst_msr_qId = master_msr.get('qInfo', {}).get('qId', '') if chart_color_byMsrDef_key == chart_mst_msr_qId: chart_color_def = master_msr.get('qMeasure', {}).get('qLabel', '') else: chart_color_def = chart_color_altLabel else: chart_color_def = '' #     ''' else: for master_dim in master_dimensions: master_dim_qId = master_dim.get('qInfo', {}).get('qId', '') if dim_qLibraryId == master_dim_qId: master_dim_qFieldDefs = master_dim.get('qDim', {}).get('qFieldDefs', '') master_dim_qFieldLabels = master_dim.get('qDim', {}).get('qFieldLabels', '') master_dim_qFieldDefs_str = ', '.join(master_dim_qFieldDefs) master_dim_qFieldLabels_str = ', '.join(master_dim_qFieldLabels) dimensions_html_list += f''' {master_dim_qFieldLabels_str} (Master Dimension):

    {master_dim_qFieldDefs_str}



    ''' dimensions_html_list += f'''
    ''' charts_html_list += dimensions_html_list # Checking if Measures are available if 'qMeasures' in chart_qHyperCube: chart_measures = chart_qHyperCube['qMeasures'] # Checking if Measures list is not empty if chart_measures: measures_html_list = f'''
    Measures:
    ''' for msr in chart_measures: msr_qLibraryId = msr.get('qLibraryId', '') msr_qLabel = msr['qDef'].get('qLabel', '') msr_qDef = msr['qDef'].get('qDef', '') msr_qLabel_html = msr_qDef if not msr_qLabel else msr_qLabel if not msr_qLibraryId: measures_html_list += f''' {msr_qLabel_html}:

    {msr_qDef}



    ''' else: for master_msr in master_measures: master_msr_qId = master_msr.get('qInfo', {}).get('qId', '') if msr_qLibraryId == master_msr_qId: master_msr_qLabel = master_msr.get('qMeasure', {}).get('qLabel', '') master_msr_qDef = master_msr.get('qMeasure', {}).get('qDef', '') measures_html_list += f''' {master_msr_qLabel} (Master Measure):

    {master_msr_qDef}



    ''' measures_html_list += f'''
    ''' charts_html_list += measures_html_list charts_html_list += '''
    ''' if chart_qType == 'sn-layout-container' or chart_qType == 'sn-tabbed-container' or chart_qType == 'container': child_html_list +='''
    ''' charts_html_list += child_html_list charts_html_list += ''' ''' # SheetType sheet_properties_html += f'''
    Type:
    {sheet_Type} {sheet_qType} ({app_spaceType} space)
    ''' sheet_properties_html += f'''
    ID:
    {sheet_qId}
    ''' sheet_properties_html += f'''
    Description:
    {sheet_description}
    ''' sheet_properties_html += f'''
    Grid Resolution:
    {sheet_gridResolution}
    ''' # SheetMode sheet_properties_html += f'''
    Sheet Mode:
    {sheet_sheetMode if sheet_sheetMode != '' else 'responsive'}
    ''' sheet_properties_html += f'''

      {charts_cnt_html}
    ''' # Combine HTML list items into a complete HTML list sheets_html += f'''

    {sheet_title}

    (sheet)

    • Jump to sheet
    {sheet_properties_html}
    ''' if charts_html_list: # Sceenshot of Dashboard sheets_html += f'''
    {charts_html_list}
    ''' return sheets_html # Dictionary for field types mapping field_type_mapping = { 'U': 'Unknown', 'A': 'Ascii', 'I': 'Integer', 'R': 'Real', 'F': 'Fix', 'M': 'Money', 'D': 'Date', 'T': 'Time', 'TS': 'Timestamp', 'IV': 'Interval' } # Load the CSS Rules custom_css = inputs['custom_css'] # Get User Selections for the Documentation Sections docu_sections_json = inputs['docu_sections_json'] user_selections = docu_sections_json.get('selected', []) # Get automation runtime auto_runtime = inputs['auto_runtime'] # Identify JSON Objects app_info_json = inputs['app_info_json'] app_url = inputs['app_url'] tenant_url = inputs['tenant_url'] measures_json = inputs['measures_json'] dimensions_json = inputs['dimensions_json'] variables_json = inputs['variables_json'] sheets_json = inputs['sheets_json'] container_objs_json = inputs['container_objs'] objs_base64 = inputs['objs_base64'] script_str = inputs['script_str']['qScript'] # Get secific values from input app_id = app_info_json.get('info', {}).get('attributes', {}).get('id', {}) # Check if they contain data app_info_exists = 1 if app_info_json else 0 measures_exist = 1 if measures_json else 0 dimensions_exist = 1 if dimensions_json else 0 variables_exist = 1 if variables_json else 0 sheets_exist = 1 if sheets_json else 0 script_exist = 1 if script_str else 0 # Generate HTML navigation_bar_html = navigation_bar_to_html(sheets_json, docu_sections_json, app_info_exists, measures_exist, dimensions_exist, variables_exist, sheets_exist, script_exist) app_info_html, app_name = app_info_to_html(app_info_json) data_model_html = data_model_to_html(app_info_json) if 'Data Model' in user_selections and app_info_json else '' measures_html = measures_to_html(measures_json) if 'Measures' in user_selections and measures_json else '' dimensions_html = dimensions_to_html(dimensions_json) if 'Dimensions' in user_selections and dimensions_json else '' variables_html = variables_to_html(variables_json) if 'Variables' in user_selections and variables_json else '' sheets_html = sheets_to_html(sheets_json, dimensions_json, measures_json, container_objs_json) if 'Sheets and Visualizations' in user_selections and sheets_json else '' script_html = script_to_html(script_str) if 'Load Script' in user_selections and script_str else '' app_name_html = f'

    {app_name}:

    ' # Generate HTML page with the HTML table html_doc = f''' Technical Dokumentation
    {navigation_bar_html}

    Created: {auto_runtime}

    {app_name}

    Technical Documentation


    This technical documentation serves as a comprehensive guide to understanding the structure, components, and functionalities of the Qlik App. It provides detailed insights into the data model, script transformations, calculated measures and dimensions, sheets, associated visualizations, and variables utilized within the application. The documentation is generated directly from the app metadata using DocuGen, ensuring accuracy and reliability.


    • Jump to app

    General Information

    This section provides essential details and statistics regarding the App, including its name, description, unique ID, ownership information, creation, modification, and reload times, as well as its size in the system.


    Application details:

    {app_info_html}
    ''' if 'Data Model' in user_selections and app_info_json: html_doc += f'''

    Data Model

    The data model section outlines the schema and relationships between different data entities within the Qlik App. It includes information on tables, fields, keys, and associations, providing a clear understanding of how data is organized and interconnected.


    {data_model_html}
    ''' if 'Measures' in user_selections and measures_json: html_doc += f'''

    Measures

    This section presents each user-defined measure with its business label, description, calculation format, technical name, and corresponding tags. By exploring these details, users can gain a deeper understanding of the measures employed within the application and their significance in driving analytical insights.


    {measures_html}
    ''' if 'Dimensions' in user_selections and dimensions_json: html_doc += f'''

    Dimensions

    Within the Qlik App, user-defined dimensions are fundamental components for categorizing and organizing data, enabling deeper insights into various facets of business operations. This section serves as a comprehensive compilation of data concerning the user-defined dimensions. Each dimension is presented with its business label, description, calculation format, technical name, and corresponding tags. By exploring these details, users can gain a comprehensive understanding of the dimensions employed within the application and their significance in facilitating data analysis and visualization.


    {dimensions_html}
    ''' if 'Variables' in user_selections and variables_json: html_doc += f'''

    Variables

    This section compiles comprehensive details for each variable, including its unique identifier, title, definition, developer comments, and corresponding tags. By understanding the role and usage of these variables, users can effectively leverage their capabilities within the application.


    {variables_html}
    ''' if 'Sheets and Visualizations' in user_selections and sheets_json: html_doc += f'''

    Sheets and Visualizations

    This section provides a comprehensive exploration of the various sheets within the Qlik App, accompanied by insights into their purpose, visualization layout, and the data insights they offer. Each sheet is presented with its unique identifier, a brief description, and details regarding the number and types of objects it contains. Additionally, individual visualizations are highlighted, showcasing their identifiers, titles, types, and the measures/dimensions utilized, if applicable.


    {sheets_html}
    ''' if 'Load Script' in user_selections and script_str: html_doc += f'''

    Load Script

    The data load script serves as the backbone of the Qlik App, orchestrating the process of fetching, transforming, and loading data from various sources. This section provides a detailed overview of the script transformations applied during the data loading process, encompassing data cleansing, filtering, aggregation, and joins. All sections are listed with their corresponding contents being presented as originally formatted.


    {script_html}
    ''' html_doc += f'''

    BACK TO TOP

    ''' # Print HTML page print(html_doc)
